page.title: 07HOUSING III
page.content: In{Wilford}most of the{houses}are detached. They are made of brick and have a tiled roof. Most of them have central heating. In Wilford we have a lot of land space and some of it is being built on. Some of the houses are quite old, especially those near the church. Some of them back on to the{River Trent. We did a{traffic}count of vehicles passing through Wilford. In half an hour, there were 91 cars, 30 vans, 22 lorries, 5 bicycles, 15 motor bikes and 8 buses. I think there were more cars because people go to work in cars every day. Not many people work in Wilford but many pass through it in order to get to work.
